name: Sato The Dog
description: $SATO is a DOG memecoin named after Coinbase co-founder Brian Armstrong's cat TOSHI and the pseudonymous creator of Bitcoin, Satoshi Nakamoto. NO TOSHI WITHOUT SATO! It serves coincide with TOSHI the Cat as the face and mascots of Base, the Ethereum aligned, layer-2 blockchain created by Coinbase. Sato aims to become the Face of Base and a leading figure in the burgeoning Base ecosystem. Leveraging a robust meme culture and an expanding community, Sato strives to be the premier memecoin on Base, drawing in the masses with its significant utility and industry-recognized brand to onboard billions onchain.
